attributes.action: review the Vehicle Excise Duty (VED / Road Tax) paid on road legal Quadricycles which fall outside of the C02 emissions testing at the Type Approval stage, and bring VED for Quadricycles in line with other similarly sized vehicles classed as 'Cars' which are CO2 tested and therfore charged at much lower rates.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Quadricycles take on many forms, from 4 Wheel Ride On Motorcycles to 'Buggy' style vehicles and Small cars with up to 4 Seats and Boot. Quadricycles are further categorised as either Heavy or Light.

The 'Type Approval' process for vehicles classified as a Quadricycle does not allow for testing C02 emissions thus eliminating them from 
the current Banded VED structure and placing them into the Private/light goods Category (TC11) at cost of £120.00 per year.

We feel that the government should re evaluate the taxation 
procedures and charges for quadricycles and create a separate VED Taxation 
Category for all Quadricycles.
